casebody.data:
ACCARDI
v.
HARTFORD UNDERWRITERS INSURANCE COMPANY 42A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 15, 2019 Daniel K. Bryson, Attorney at Law, J. Hunter Bryson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Accardi, Thomas. Stephen D. Feldman, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Kim E. Rinehart, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, David R. Roth, Attorney at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for Hartford Underwriters Insurance Company. Mark R. Sigmon, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for United Policyholders. Roger A. Peters, II, Attorney at Law, for American Property Casualty Insurance Association.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of May 2019 by Gary E. Mason for Admission Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of May 2019."
